column2: A Movie a Day for a Year 2020
column5:
A log of my attempt to watch a feature-length movie every day for a year. Movies are ranked in the order I watched them, January 1st at the top and as far as I get at the bottom. This isn't every movie that I've watched in 2020, just the first viewed of each day. The following are some collected stats so far.

Best: Nightcrawler

Worst: Accidental Love

Earliest I've finished a film: 10:56 AM

Latest I've finished a film: 11:53 PM

Goal: 366 days

Achieved: 48 days

LIST ENDED, CHALLENGE FAILED. FINALS HURT LIKE A MOFO.
